TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase

summary.span: 用作 Web 部件控件集内的主控件，用于在网页中承载 控件。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件功能区域是包含 Web 部件控件的网页上定义的区域。In the Web Parts feature, a zone is a defined region on a Web page that contains Web Parts controls. 区域的主要功能是它包含的控件进行布局，并为这些控件提供常见的用户界面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 有关区域和如何在 Web 部件应用程序中使用的常规信息，请参阅基的参考文档并类和主题标题为[Web 部件控件集概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668)。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the reference documentation for the base and classes, and the topic entitled [Web Parts Control Set Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668). 特殊的函数控件将包含控件，后者构成主 UI 的 Web 部件应用程序。The special function of the control is to contain controls, which form the main UI of Web Parts applications. 一个控件可以在网页上，使开发人员将其用作模板并将添加在其他服务器控件声明中的持久性格式``元素。A control can be declared in persistence format on a Web page, enabling developers to use it as a template and to add other server controls within the `` element. 任何类型的服务器控件，如果添加到区域，客户端可作为控件在运行时。Any type of server control, if added to a zone, can function as a control at run time. 不管添加的控件是否是控件、 用户控件、 自定义控件或 ASP.NET 控件。This is true regardless of whether the added control is a control, a user control, a custom control, or an ASP.NET control. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题类。For more information, see the topic for the class. 除了包含控件，控件还提供了一个通用的 UI，它包含的控件。Besides containing controls, a control also provides a common UI for the controls it contains. 此公共用户界面，统称为 chrome 中，包含外围 UI 元素上所有控件，如边框、 标题、 页眉和页脚、 样式特征和谓词 （即用户可以在控件上执行，例如关闭或最小化 UI 操作）。This common UI, known collectively as chrome, consists of the peripheral UI elements on all the controls, such as the border, title, header and footer, style characteristics, and verbs (UI actions that a user can carry out on a control, such as close or minimize). > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer 可能会呈现的高度或其包含的控件以意外方式，具体取决于区域的方向。Internet Explorer might render the height of a or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档或属性。For more details, see the documentation for the or the properties. 类从基类派生的大多数行为并类; 它将添加一个唯一的成员，属性。The class derives most of its behavior from the base and classes; it adds only one unique member, the property. 此属性引用对象，它是一个模板，允许页面开发人员定义的控件在某个区域中以静态方式使用``.aspx 页的声明性标记中的元素。This property references an object, which is a template that allows page developers to define the controls in a zone statically by using a `` element in the declarative markup of an .aspx page. ## 辅助功能Accessibility 默认情况下，此控件呈现的标记可能不符合可访问性标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级为 1 指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将Web 部件页中的控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control in a Web Parts page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 该示例的第一部分演示继承的自定义类类，以及设置基区域属性的两个构造函数中。The first part of the example shows a custom class that inherits from the class, and that sets two of the base zone properties in the constructor. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/mywebpartzone.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/mywebpartzone.vb#3)] 该示例的第二部分显示了一个包含自定义的页面控件。The second part of the example shows a page that contains the custom control. 请注意，该网页要求特殊`Register`指令要引用程序集包含自定义区域的页的顶部附近。Notice that the page requires a special `Register` directive near the top of the page to reference the assembly that contains the custom zone. 此页还包含``元素，每个 Web 部件页必需的。The page also contains an `` element, which is required on every Web Parts page. ``元素，它表示自定义控件，包含标准 ASP.NET控件。The `` element, which represents the custom control, contains a standard ASP.NET control. 由于包含在区域中，控件将与包装控件在运行时，使其能够充当控件。Because it is contained within a zone, the control will be wrapped with a control at run time, which enables it to act as a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#1)] 检查自定义的声明性标记控件。Examine the declarative markup for the custom control. 下面的代码示例中所示，请注意，您可以在标记中，设置区域级别的各种属性。Notice that you can set various zone-level properties in the markup, as shown in the following code example. > [!NOTE] > 它是非常重要，请注意使用``元素。It is very important to note the use of the `` element. 此元素，如备注部分中描述是必需的内区域来包装静态页中声明的控件。This element, as described in the Remarks section, is required within a zone to wrap the static controls that are declared in a page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#2)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是默认构造函数，并且未设置任何值。The method is a default constructor and does not set any values. 但是，派生的类可以使用构造函数来设置基本区域属性，若要创建标准的行为和自定义区域控件的外观。However, derived classes can use the constructor to set base zone properties, to create standard behaviors and appearance for a custom zone control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了上一个自定义的构造函数使用类来设置此区域的多个基本属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of a constructor on a custom class to set several base properties for the zone. 此方法可能会很有用，如果你想要创建自定义具有特定的行为和外观的控件。This approach could be useful if you want to create a custom control that has specific behaviors and appearance. 在的示例部分中找到的示例中，包括自定义类和一个.aspx 页，以承载该控件的完整代码类概述主题。The full code for the example, including both the custom class and an .aspx page to host the control, is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/mywebpartzone.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/mywebpartzone.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection GetInitialWebParts() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function GetInitialWebParts () As WebPartCollection

summary.span: 重写抽象基方法，并获取区域模板中初始的静态 控件集。

span.span: Overrides the abstract base method and gets the initial set of static controls contained within the zone's template.

returns.span: 包含区域模板中的所有 控件或其他服务器控件的 。

span.span: A that contains all the or other server controls contained in the zone's template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供的抽象基实现方法。The method provides an implementation of the abstract base method. 基方法不提供任何实现，但声明的方法，以便派生的类可以自定义如何他们将获取属于的控件的初始集在区域中，无需考虑的个性化设置更改。The base method provides no implementation, but declares the method so that derived classes can customize how they will get the initial set of controls that belong in a zone, without taking personalization changes into account. 在区域中，找到每个服务器控件调用方法。For each server control found in the zone, the method is called. 如果直接从控件继承类，它只需添加到该区域集合 (和类似集合的控件)。If a control inherits directly from the class, it is simply added to the zone's collection (and to the similar collection of the control). 如果控件不会直接从继承，Web 部件控件集包装与控件对象，使得控件可以将用作控件在运行时。If a control does not inherit directly from , the Web Parts control set wraps the control with a object, which enables the control to behave as a control at run time. 类实现的基方法通过返回的控件的集合 （如果有） 中的一组静态声明``中 Web 部件页的标记的标记。The class implements the base method by returning the set of controls (if any) that are statically declared within a set of `` tags in the markup of a Web Parts page. 如果控件声明在某个区域中，子控件的控件添加，而不是控件本身。If a control is declared in a zone, the child controls of that control are added, rather than the control itself. 此实现允许您以，例如，创建区域中主页面，然后再声明单个或内容页面中的服务器控件。This implementation allows you to, for example, create a zone in a master page, and then declare individual or server controls in a content page. 如果声明中的控件区域，它们将被忽略。If you declare controls in a zone, they are ignored. > [!NOTE] > 返回控件的初始集合个性化设置发生之后，方法可能与不同的区域中的控件的实际运行时集合。The initial collection of controls returned by the method might be different from the actual run-time collection of controls in a zone, after personalization has taken place. 例如，假设有一个包含两个网页控件和第一个包含用户控件名为`User1`中以静态方式声明的``标记。For example, suppose you have a Web page with two controls, and the first one contains user control named `User1` that is statically declared within the `` tags. 如果用户加载页面和拖动`User1`到第二个区域，然后`User1`仍是通过调用返回的集合的一部分方法的第一个区域，因为它被声明为该区域中。If a user loads the page and drags `User1` into the second zone, then `User1` is still part of the collection that is returned by calling the method for the first zone, because it is declared in that zone. 但在运行时，当控件加载个性化设置数据`User1`实际显示在其中用户拖动它的第二个区域中。But at run time, when the control loads the personalization data, `User1` actually appears in the second zone where the user dragged it.

summary.span: 重写基方法，以指示区域已向 控件进行了成功的注册。

span.span: Overrides the base method to indicate that the zone has successfully been registered with the control.

Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate

summary.span: 获取或设置对 实例的引用，该实例包含网页标记中声明的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to an instance that contains the controls declared in the markup of a Web page.

value.span: 包含区域中 控件的 。

span.span: An that contains the controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是指实例中控件。The property refers to an instance within a control. 该模板包含可以声明中的静态服务器控件控制，包括控件、 用户控件、 自定义控件和 ASP.NET 控件。The template contains static server controls that you can declare within a control, including controls, user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls. 当您添加静态或其他服务器控件添加到网页上的声明性标记，则必须将一对中的控件的标记放置``标记。When you add static or other server controls to a in the declarative markup of a Web page, you must place the tags for the controls within a pair of `` tags. 如果不声明内的控件``标记，将引发异常。If you do not declare the controls within `` tags, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将Web 部件页的声明性标记中的属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property in the declarative markup of a Web Parts page. 在示例部分中找到有关示例，包括自定义类和一个.aspx 页，以承载该控件的完整代码类概述主题。The full code for the example, including a custom class and an .aspx page to host the control, is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 请注意，标记中控件，没有``元素，其中包含对日历控件的引用。Notice that, in the markup for the control, there is a `` element that contains a reference to the Calendar control. 如果你想要添加其他控件或其他服务器控件添加到该区域，您还可以添加在``标记。If you wanted to add additional controls or other server controls to the zone, you could also add them within the `` tags. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#2)]

exception.span: 区域中 控件的注册工作已完成。

span.span: Registration of the controls in the zone is already complete.
